text:
Canal+, it's a company
which is 40 years old.

We are leader in more
than 40 countries. In OTT.

We are the first broadcaster
of UEFA Champion League.

We broadcast Formula
One in different countries, in
Africa, in Europe, in Asia.

We have started migration
five years ago to move
to cloud and we use AWS services.

Our collaboration with
AWS empowers our business
in a different way.
And we work as partners with AWS consultants,

so we know exactly what we
would like to do in terms

of strategy, in term of
development, it's not just a call

of support to open a
ticket, it's more a partner.

So we use AWS experts
for most complex projects,

and we train also the people
to be sure that they can answer
to the challenge of today and tomorrow.
We designed a training plan with AWS.
We create the foundation of this AI,

but also for cyber, for
finops, we collaborate with AWS
to train more than 350 employees.
We also adopted AWS Skill Builder.
With Skill Builder, it's very easy

because people can learn
when they're ready to learn.

Also, the developers are
more and more comfortable

with the cloud and
we're pretty sure that

we save a lot of time with
the different services,

which is the most important
for a company like Canal+.
